name: Skitterwidget
condition_immunities: blinded, deafened, exhaustion, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.Lightning Absorption: Whenever the skitterwidget is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.
traits.Unusual Nature: The skitterwidget doesn\'t require air, food, drink, or sleep.
